title: 107_hr504
content: Community Access to Health Care Act of 2001 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants for the purpose of assisting the development of integrated health care delivery systems to: (1) serve communities of individuals who are uninsured and individuals who are underinsured, (2) expand the scope of services provided. And (3) improve the efficiency and coordination among the providers of such services. Authorizes appropriations.
